reviewText:
At least 100 shots are done here that you will have to practice hard in getting the correct stroke to execute.
It has opened my eyes to the infinite possibilities of shot making, safety play, banking, kicks and caroms.

Again, you will need to execute these shots with a consistent correct stroke. You can't learn how to make these shots by watching the DVD.
You must practice, hard with a killer attitude towards the game.

To see the shots performed proves they are able to be made, so there it is..
